title: Colin Allred launches bid for 2026 Texas Senate seat
shortDescription: Former Dallas-area congressman Colin Allred has launched a bid to run for John Cornyn's Senate seat in the 2026 election.

title: Netanyahu calls for end to Hamas after Trump ceasefire call
shortDescription: "There will not be a Hamas. There will not be a Hamastan. We're not going back to that. It's over," Netanyahu said.

title: Senate passes Trump's big bill; House battle is next | The Excerpt
shortDescription: USA TODAY Chief Political Correspondent Phillip M. Bailey gives some of his biggest takeaways after the Senate's passage of Trump's BBB and more.

title: GOP Sen. Lisa Murkowski stares down reporter in viral exchange
shortDescription: Sen. Lisa Murkowski stared down a reporter in a tense exchange that went viral online.

title: Zohran Mamdani responds to President Trump
shortDescription: New York City mayoral candidate Zohran Mamdani responded to President Donald Trump's threats of arrest, saying it's "an attack on democracy."

title: Speaker Johnson says Republicans will expand majority in 2026 election
shortDescription: House Speaker Mike Johnson said he expects Republicans to maintain or widen their majority in Congress in 2026.

title: House takes up Trump's sweeping legislative tax package again
shortDescription: The House returns to vote on Senate changes to Trump's legislative package of tax cuts and Medicaid changes.

title: Judge blocks Trump from ending temporary Haitian immigration program
shortDescription: A federal judge blocked the Trump administration from ending a temporary program for Haitian immigrants to work and be protected from deportation.

title: Iran enacts law suspending cooperation with UN nuclear watchdog
shortDescription: The law stipulates that any future inspection of Iran's nuclear sites by the IAEA needs approval by Tehran's Supreme National Security Council.

title: Trump threatens to arrest NYC's Mamdani if he blocks ICE
shortDescription: U.S. President Donald Trump said that if New York City Democratic mayoral nominee Zohran Mamdani interferes with ICE, then "we'll have to arrest him."

title: Paramount to pay Trump $16M to settle lawsuit
shortDescription: Paramount has agreed to pay US President Donald Trump $16 million to settle his lawsuit over the editing of a ‘60 Minutes’ interview.

title: Paramount to pay $16M to settle Trump suit over '60 Minutes' interview
shortDescription: Paramount said it would pay $16 million to settle the lawsuit, with the money allocated to Donald Trump's future presidential library.

title: Trump urges Hamas to accept 'final proposal' for 60-day Gaza ceasefire
shortDescription: Trump said Israel has agreed to the conditions to finalize a 60-day ceasefire, "during which time we will work with all parties to end the War."

title: ‘The elephant is on crack’: Trump fuels boost in national pride on Canada Day
shortDescription: In the Donald Trump era, Canadians say it's no longer enough to just be proud of their heritage. It's time to stand up and proclaim it.

title: Zohran Mamdani responds to Trump's threat to arrest him
shortDescription: Mamdani, the Democratic nominee for mayor of New York City and a state Assembly member, called the threat "an attack on our democracy."

title: Trump says daughter-in-law 'first choice' to replace Tillis in Senate
shortDescription: "Somebody who would really be great is Lara, she grew up there," Trump said of his daughter-in-law in discussing the North Carolina Senate seat.

title: Medicare vs. Medicaid: Defining each term as cuts pass the Senate
shortDescription: The so-called "One, Big Beautiful Bill," spanning over 900 pages, includes the largest cuts to Medicaid in the program's 50-plus years. What to know.

title: Dems blast GOP Senators for passing spending bill
shortDescription: Democrats sharply criticized GOP Senators for passing President Donald Trump's "Big Beautiful Bill."

title: Trump at Alligator Alcatraz with Kristi Noem: ICE detention center videos
shortDescription: Where is Alligator Alcatraz? Dubbed East Coast version of famed prison, Trump and Kristi Noem visited new ICE detention center in Ochopee, Florida.

title: Trump: CNN may be prosecuted for reporting on ICE sighting app
shortDescription: DHS Secretary Kristi Noem said the Trump administration is exploring prosecuting CNN for reporting on an app that alerts users to nearby ICE agents.

title: Trump calls Biden a 'son of a b----' as he tours 'Alligator Alcatraz'
shortDescription: President Trump referred to Joe Biden as a "son of a b---" as he toured a detention facility in the Florida Everglades known as "Alligator Alcatraz."

title: Musk and Trump battle over tax bill. Republican lawmakers are over it
shortDescription: Billionaire Elon Musk and President Donald Trump lash out over signature tax bill. GOP lawmakers in Congress are divided over Musk's criticisms.
